author: rwesten
msg: STANBOL-875: added SolrYard schema.xml configuration including paoding filed definition; minor: corrected language code for Japanese to 'ja' (was 'jp'), The SolrYard now logs ignored empty and NULL values on DEBUG level (was WARN)

author: chirino
msg: Added a activemq-osgi module which is an uber OSGi bundle of all the ActiveMQ jars to make integrating into OSGi a little simpler.

author: chirino
msg: Make the activemq module just plain jars instead of bundles.

msg: Add the slf4j-api as a dependency of the leveldb store.
